title: Phone USB-C Not working for headphones
content:
My headphones are not working on the USB-C port either by offical headphones or official usb-c dongle.

I've re-started the phone, cleaned the usb-c port , tried different usb cables to headphones/chargers/laptop and the issue persists.

Also tried changing the default USB mode on the dev setting but is not working either i still have the "Android P: Device connected as charging device" notification not being allowed either to change the "controled by" option.

This happened randomly, it was working on the morning and after work it wouldn't work, already waited 1 week and the issue persists , i didn't expose the phone to water.




Google Pixel 3 XL 
Build number: PQ3A.190505.002
Hardware Version: MP1.0
Android Security Patch : May 5, 2019

Thanks for your help, this is really annoying.


https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/1339664?hl=en
